alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 7:27AM EDT until May 30 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Melbourne FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The river level at the Saint Johns River at Astor continues to increase this morning and has reached Minor Flood Stage, due to northerly winds. The river is expected to continue to rise into tonight, remaining in Minor Flood Stage, before decreasing Sunday night into Tuesday. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1100 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Astor. * WHEN...From this morning to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 2.3 feet, Minor flooding of low lying streets and yards north of Fox Road on Lake County side of Astor, and from River Road northward on Volusia side of river. Water begins to cover docks at South Moon Fish Camp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 2.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 AM EDT Saturday was 2.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 2.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu St Johns River Astor 2.3 2.3 Sat 6 am 2.5 2.4 2.2 2.0 1.9 &&
